title: Clive Davis: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: In the history of popular music, no one looms as large as Clive Davis. His career has spanned more than forty years, and he has discovered, signed, or worked with a staggering array of artists. Join us for a moderated discussion as Clive talks with "Rolling Stone" contributing editor Anthony DeCurtis about "The Soundtrack of My Life"—his star-studded autobiography.

itunes:keywords: Clive Davis, The Soundtrack of My Life, music business, J Records, Columbia Records, Anthony DeCurtis, Apple Store, Author, ibooks
